message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll find it a great value.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1050000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll find it a great value.

I'll offer $1035000, but if you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll consider buying the product from John for $1000000.
